reference.shortdesc: The indexlist element either references a topic that contains an index for the book, or it indicates to a processor that an index should be generated at this location in the book.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: For the indexlist element, a processor typically generates an index based on index terms used in the book.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The indexlist element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the bookmap module.
